message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its current users. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $750000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the product's features, $750000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $500000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and benefits of our product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $600000 for the product.
Alice, $600000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $550000.  This is my final offer.  If you're not able to accept, I'll have to look elsewhere.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $575000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
